    • getUserHome

    • getInstallationPaths

      private List<String> getInstallationPaths(Installer.OSName os)
      Obtain a list of installation paths depending on the operating system.

      The list of paths is produced according to the documentation found here: kernel-spec

      Parameters:
      os - operating system
      Returns:
      list of installation paths ordered by priority, from most important in descending order
